Registry of Open Data on AWS

Coupled Model Intercomparison Project 6

agriculture atmosphere climate earth observation environmental model oceans simulations weather

Description

The sixth phase of global coupled ocean-atmosphere general circulation model ensemble. Additional data can be requested via Google Form

Update Frequency

Core CMIP6 datasets are added as soon as they are available.

License

https://pcmdi.llnl.gov/CMIP6/TermsOfUse/TermsOfUse6-1.html

Documentation

https://www.wcrp-climate.org/wgcm-cmip/wgcm-cmip6

Managed By

ESGF and Pangeo

See all datasets managed by ESGF and Pangeo.

Contact

https://github.com/pangeo-data/pangeo-datastore/issues

Usage Examples

Tutorials
  • Processing CMIP6 data in Zarr format with Dask & AWS Fargate by Zac Flamig
Publications
  • Special issue | Coupled Model Intercomparison Project Phase 6 (CMIP6) Experimental Design and Organization by V. Eyring

Resources on AWS

  • Description
    Zarr formatted data
    Resource type
    S3 Bucket
    Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
    arn:aws:s3:::cmip6-pds
    AWS Region
    us-west-2
    AWS CLI Access (No AWS account required)
    aws s3 ls s3://cmip6-pds/ --no-sign-request
    Explore
    Browse Bucket
  • Description
    Netcdf formatted data managed by the Earth System Grid Federation
    Resource type
    S3 Bucket
    Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
    arn:aws:s3:::esgf-world
    AWS Region
    us-east-2
    AWS CLI Access (No AWS account required)
    aws s3 ls s3://esgf-world/ --no-sign-request
    Explore
    Browse Bucket
